review_text: The doctors in the emergency and ICU are very empathetic and helpful. They keep you informed and are sincere in their efforts to save patients.

The worst hospital of all time. The staff is not even a bit trained. A nurse did not even know how to inject branula she injected and took it out atleast 10 times in my hand until my hand became blue and swelled. When I said to her she blamed me. Not recommended not even for an injection. Picture attached is taken after 7 hours hand is still blue and swelling can be seen.

Pharmacy at the hospital have their own prices and double than the well renowned pharmacies. Hospital administration need to correct the prices.
We know that hospitals are very profitable and safe investment in Pakistan and flourishing with the help of corrupt system. However , People are advised not to use them untill hospital administration take the corrective action. Looking forward to see a positive response by the hospital.
